text: Jamshoro () is the capital city of Jamshoro District in the Sindh province of Pakistan. It is on the right bank of Indus River. It is about northwest of the city of Hyderabad.Location of Jam Shoro - Falling Rain Genomics ==Related pages== * Jamshoro District ==References== Category:Cities in Sindh Category:Jamshoro District
title: Jamshoro
